feat.value: They said in Scetis concerning Abba Daniel,
that when the barbarians came the brothers fled
and the old man said, 'If God does not care about me, why live?'
But he came through the barbarians and they did not see him.
The old man said, 'Behold, God has cared for me and I did not die.
You, too, do what is human and run like the other fathers.'
